item.description:
Economy got you down?  Property values taking away your wealth?  Why not form a Monopoly? :-)

Just like how the Monopoly game keeps returning to McDonald's because it makes them crazy sales, I will host another Monopoly themed meetup to make me crazy popular.  But this time with a twist. :-D

While last year we managed 10 straight hours of fun playing different Monopoly variations, if that doesn't seem like your cup of tea, the theme today will also include any "auction" style game.  That means bring your favorite euro game that includes wealth-hoarding and/or cornering the market on a specific resource with a bidding/auction mechanic, and we will be sure to play them while having an open dialogue on the cutthroat business practices these games makes us perform.

This is a winner-take-all event so bring your wits and friendly competitive spirit and let's game on.

 

----------------------------

This is a  Mini-Meetup. Anyone can sign up, but I would please ask that you  allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they are on the waiting list since there is limited seating.  Thanks. See this  discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "decadence".  Please bring a food item to share with the group that fits that theme.  Interpret that however you want.  I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location:  
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Occupy Marvin Gardens
